core:processNote.core:description: Normally when we edit an existing transaction the list tender action negates any transaction specific signs so that positive values are displayed while the apply tenders action restores the transaction specific signs. In this process, we must pass the request transaction to the list tenders action. Furthermore we rely on the in request signing values negatively ready for the subsequent out exchange.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Set a simple flag that the prompts can use to determine which button captions to use.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: The Fail outcome indicates that the current basket need not be discarded.

core:action.core:comment: Dummy action to ensure that all privileges used in sub-processes and CheckPrivilegesAction are also listed against this process in the role maintenance app.

core:assignAction.core:comment:
Amend transaction type to match request transaction. (An OUT request TO our till must be executed as an IN exchange at our till FROM the other till)
Record reference owner and request transaction ID.

core:action.core:comment: Convert the TerminalExchange transaction to a TerminalRejectExchange transaction.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Go back and clear any remaining alerts if there was one or no requests.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Check for any exchange confirmation alerts and return the process ID.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Because SetSessionDetails is executed remotely we must save the updated COPY of the transaction in our handler.
